Name: Holiday Cheer 3
About the game: Discover this cheerful Christmas themed match 3 puzzle game on your PC. Ease into Classic match 3 style puzzle game play for a holiday filled with fun! Game Features: ARE YOU IN THE HOLIDAY MOOD? We all love to soak up that holiday atmosphere that comes but once a year! Escape in to this puzzling winter wonderland. Explore a Christmas decorated Victorian house with ! CASUAL GEM-MATCHING FUN The classic casual match 3+ game play we have all come to love! SPECIAL GEMS Create Snowflake Gem which explodes into a hundred snowflakes when you destroy it or match the Christmas Light Gem for a string of lights to destroy rows of gems. The Santa Claus Gem destroys all gems of the color you match it with. ENJOY THE MUSIC The upbeat soundtrack featuring 10 atmospheric Christmas songs will have you humming along in no time! BEAUTIFUL GRAPHICS Beautiful graphics with 10 unique Christmas themed backgrounds for gameplay!
